Package othello.model.server

Class Protocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • othello.model.server.Protocol
  • public final class Protocol
extends java.lang.Object
    Protocol class with constants and methods for creating protocol messages

                                           java.lang.String index)

        Returns:
        messages match Protocol

      • forwardError

        public static java.lang.String forwardError​(java.lang.String description)
        Any errors in server should be notify to clients as sufficient as Protocol. That's the same as client side. It makes changes in error messages to be consumed as Protocol messages.
        Parameters:
        description - reason of the errors
        Returns:
        message matches Protocol

        public static java.lang.String forwardNewGame​(OthelloGame game)
